fields.headline: For the record
fields.bodyText: An article referred to the NHS’s 100th birthday celebrations when 70th was meant (“Austerity cuts are blamed for 130,000 preventable deaths”, 2 June, News, page 16). We misdescribed Dentsu Aegis as “the Japanese insurance giant”. Its business is advertising and marketing (“Court battles and cash hassles: chaotic spirit of new Woodstock”, 2 June, News, page 6). Write to the Readers’ Editor, the Observer, York Way, London N1 9GU, email observer.readers@observer.co.uk, tel 020 3353 4736
